attributes.action: Enforce Local Councils to enforce the law regarding driving and parking on footpaths, to punish offenders and to protect pedestirans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more footpaths are being damaged and obstructed by illegal parking, placing people at risk when they have to walk on the road to avoid the obstructions and costing council tax payers increasing sums for the repairs of pavements and footpaths damaged by motor vehicles.  Pavements and footpaths are for pedestians not for cars.
